Text:
Which file is the crack? I have no clue, TESV? It can't be the SkyrimLauncher? I get the error "The program can't start because steam_api.dll is missing from your computer. Try Reinstalling the program to fix this problem."

And the steamgamesinstaller from github just crashes on startup and I get a message saying the program did not install properly. Any help would be appreciated. :D
